ee.ria.dhx.server.persistence.service

Class PersistenceService

  • java.lang.Object
    • ee.ria.dhx.server.persistence.service.PersistenceService

  • @Service
 @Transactional
public class PersistenceService
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to perform actions on persistence objects, e.g. create persistence object from DHX specific object.
    Author:
    Aleksei Kokarev

    • Method Detail

      • findOrg

        @Loggable
public Organisation findOrg(java.lang.String capsuleOrganisationId)
                                throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Finds persisted organisation using organisation code from capsule. Only active DHX organisations will be returned, otherwise DhxException will be thrown
        Parameters:
        capsuleOrganisationId - organisation id from capsule
        Returns:
        found Organisation
        Throws:
        ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException - - if orgnisation is not found or organisation is inactive or not DHX organisation

      • getFolderByNameOrDefaultFolder

        @Loggable
public Folder getFolderByNameOrDefaultFolder(java.lang.String folderName)
        Finds folder according to folderName, or by default folder name if folderName in input is NULL. If Folder is not found in database, new folder will be created.
        Parameters:
        folderName - - name of the folder to find
        Returns:
        - Folder object found

      • getOrganisationFromInternalXroadMemberAndSave

        @Loggable
public Organisation getOrganisationFromInternalXroadMemberAndSave(ee.ria.dhx.types.InternalXroadMember member,
                                                                             java.lang.Boolean representorOnly,
                                                                             java.lang.Boolean dhxOrganisation)
                                                                      throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Method finds or creates new Organisation object according to data from InternalXroadMember. If object was not found in database, if new object is created then it will be saved to database.
        Parameters:
        member - InternalXroadMember to find Organisation for
        representorOnly - whether to search only representor
        dhxOrganisation - whether to search only dhxOrganisations
        Returns:
        created or found Organisation
        Throws:
        ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException - thrown if error occurs

      • getOrganisationFromInternalXroadMember

        @Loggable
public Organisation getOrganisationFromInternalXroadMember(ee.ria.dhx.types.InternalXroadMember member)
                                                               throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Method finds or creates new Organisation object according to data from InternalXroadMember. If object was not found in database, new object is created but not saved to database.
        Parameters:
        member - InternalXroadMember to find Organisation for
        Returns:
        created or found Organisation
        Throws:
        ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException - thrown if error occurs

      • getOrganisationFromInternalXroadMember

public Organisation getOrganisationFromInternalXroadMember(ee.ria.dhx.types.InternalXroadMember member,
                                                                      java.lang.Boolean representorOnly)
                                                               throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Method finds or creates new Organisation object according to data from InternalXroadMember. If object was not found in database, new object is created but not saved to database.
        Parameters:
        member - InternalXroadMember to find Organisation for
        representorOnly - whether to search only representor
        Returns:
        created or found Organisation
        Throws:
        ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException - thrown if error occurs

      • isSpecialOrganisation

        @Loggable
public java.lang.Boolean isSpecialOrganisation(java.lang.String organisationCode)
        Method defines if organisation is one of the special organisations that are in the capsule without registration code, but with system name.
        Parameters:
        organisationCode - organisation code to check
        Returns:
        whether organistion code is special or not

      • getSpecialOrganisations

        public java.lang.String getSpecialOrganisations()
        Returns the specialOrganisations.
        Returns:
        the specialOrganisations

      • isRepresenteeValid

        public java.lang.Boolean isRepresenteeValid(ee.ria.dhx.types.InternalXroadMember member)
                                     throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Checks is representee is valid(by start and end date of the representee).
        Parameters:
        member - representee member to check
        Returns:
        whther representee is valid
        Throws:
        ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException - exception thrown if representee is null or start date is null

      • toDvkCapsuleAddressee

        @Loggable
public java.lang.String toDvkCapsuleAddressee(java.lang.String memberCode,
                                                         java.lang.String subsystem)
        Sometimes DHX addressee and DVK addresse might be different. In DHX there must be always registration code, in DVK there might be system also.
        Parameters:
        memberCode - memberCode to use to transform to DVK capsule addressee
        subsystem - subsystem to use to transform to DVK capsule addressee
        Returns:
        capsule addressee accordinbg to DVK

      • addStatusHistory

        public void addStatusHistory(Recipient recipient)
        Method creates and add new status history according to recipient's data.
        Parameters:
        recipient - recipient to create status history for

      • getAdresseeList

        @Loggable(value=1)
public java.util.List<Organisation> getAdresseeList()
        Method returns list of all addressees.
        Returns:
        list of all addressees
